title: Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' still shrinking. What else has been cut?
shortDescription: Senate rules require removing a plan to charge feeds on new migrants seeking asylum in the U.S. and relocating Space Shuttle Discovery to Houston.

title: Senate readies for weekend work on Trump's mega tax and policy bill
shortDescription: Senate Republicans have sparred with each other and the parliamentarian over a variety of provisions in the sweeping legislation.

title: Trump's aggressive immigration crackdown is getting ICE agents hurt
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says tougher immigration policies are necessary to protect the United States from an 'invasion' of migrants.

title: Could Michelle Obama be the voice Democrats need right now?
shortDescription: As Democrats search to counter Trump it may not be Barack Obama, the party's most popular figure, that they should turn to, but Michelle.

title: Senate rejects resolution to curb Trump's use of military in Iran
shortDescription: Sen. Tim Kaine won approval of a similar resolution to prevent the use of the military in Iran during Trump's first term, but the president vetoed it.

title: Trump stops trade negotiations with Canada
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he's stopped negotiating trade deals with Canada for now.

title: Trump says he'd consider bombing Iran again
shortDescription: The president dropped plans to lift sanctions on Iran and said he'd consider bombing Iran again if Tehran is enriching uranium to worrisome levels.

title: UVA president to resign after pressure from Trump DOJ
shortDescription: James E. Ryan, the president of the University of Virginia, said he would resign amid a federal civil rights probe into the school.

title: Trump admin imposes steep new fines on undocumented immigrants
shortDescription: Federal law has long given authorities the power to impose such fines, although they were rarely issued until the first Trump administration.

title: Trump ends trade talks with Canada, says he could move other deadlines
shortDescription: The announcement came after a press conference in which Trump presented an ambiguous timeline for tariffs he put on other nations to go into effect.

title: Trump's big win and other takeaways from final Supreme Court decisions
shortDescription: The final decisions the Supreme Court handed down before adjourning for the summer include a big win for Trump and a lot of 6-3 rulings.

title: Trump praises SCOTUS ruling on injunctions
shortDescription: Trump officials praised the Supreme Court’s ruling that limits district judges from issuing nationwide injunctions that blocked key federal policies.

title: Trade deals could be done by Labor Day, Trump Treasury chief says
shortDescription: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said trade talks could yield multiple deals by Sept. 1, citing a new U.S.-China agreement on rare earth shipments.

title: Trump on the threat to his life: 'I get that throbbing feeling'
shortDescription: Trump has talked about still experiencing a sensation in his ear after he was shot in an assassination attempt last July in Butler, Pennsylvania.

title: Nike says Trump’s tariffs to add to costs
shortDescription: Nike has warned that tariffs introduced by President Donald Trump could raise its costs by $1 billion this year.

title: Trump pushes Senate to keep working this weekend on mega tax bill
shortDescription: A Saturday start date for the voting process is "aspirational," Senate Majority Leader John Thune told reporters.

title: Trump retains authority over National Guard amid immigration protests
shortDescription: Appeals court rules Trump can deploy National Guard in L.A., countering lower court's decision amid protests over immigration raids.

title: After Iran bombs, how do Trump's ratings compare to past presidents?
shortDescription: Recent approval rating polls show Trump receiving worse approval than his own average. His approval ratings remain among the lowest in modern history.

title: Trump basks in new peace deal, this one in Africa
shortDescription: The U.N. accuses Rwanda of supporting rebels who have taken over large swathes of the Democratic Republic of Congo - home to valuable minerals.

title: Trump praises Amy Coney Barrett, rips NYC mayoral candidate Mamdani
shortDescription: Trump called a surprise news conference after the Supreme Court limited the extent that lower courts could block his policies nationwide.
